text: Kristy Marlana Wallace (born February 20, 1953) is an American guitarist, songwriter, arranger, producer, and sometimes a vocalist. Wallace is better known by the stage names of Poison Ivy and sometimes Poison Ivy Rorschach. She was a co-founder of the American garage punk band The Cramps. She was married to Lux Interior for 37 years until he died on February 4, 2009. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:American guitarists Category:American punk musicians Category:Living people Category:Musicians from California
title: Poison Ivy (musician)
